name: Room 13 (BETA)
description:
You are traveling to a relative's house for Christmas and it's the night before. Although the road is blocked by the mounds of snow and your car has no petrol. Your only choice is to stay at the motel in the woods, but you don't yet know what it holds.

The motel seems to be on the verge of shutting down and you find yourself feeling an eerie atmosphere on the premises. Is there something wrong or are you just being paranoid?

This short horror game is my first project and bugs/ missing features are expected, but please suggest anything in the comments so I can continue to update and improve this game.

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • E to interact
  • F to skip to the next sentence during dialogue
  • G to View Objective
